title: Disconnecting and low priority queues
body: So my internet has recently been more crappy than usual due to bad weather (i live in michigan lol), and it causes me to disconnect randomly from games which leads to me being reported. I've been placed in low priority queues so much now i'm at 20 mins per queue. My question is does this ever come to reset or am i screwed? Appreciate any comments

replies.body:
Your standing in the [*Leaverbuster System*](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) does eventually decay, but you'll have to play matches for a while *without* disconnecting from matches or going AFK. I'd strongly recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so you can configure your local network settings for League and potentially reduce the amount of disconnections that happen in the future.

Let me know if you have any questions or would like further assistance troubleshooting your network issues.
